Reviews.Title: Basic phone.
Reviews.Author: Ramesh Pappu
Reviews.Content: A basic phone with necessary features and long lasting battery. I own Galaxy S3. I watch YouTube videos lot of apps runs in the background. Battery life 8hrs. I needed a phone in case of emergency. That's why I bought this.  Phone satrts with spanish. Changing language is very easy. My friend liked this phone I ordered one for him. Inside the box phone, battery, charger and samsung proprietary head phones.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: master.aXu
Reviews.Content: Very nice compact and light basic phone, clear sound, extremely long battery life, who needs a smartphone? I am more than happy with this cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Geezer
Reviews.Content: Phone is a little smaller than I expected but not a problem.  Just a basic phone with no frills which is what I wanted.Had problem with Callender date until I was told to use DD/MM/YYYY to enter day and have it stay correct. Dont get a great signal at my home but I suspect it is the AT&T; service since it works fine when out of my area.For the money I havent seen anything to compare... Happy with what I bought.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected//UPDATE
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth S. Fox
Reviews.Content: It arrived quickly and I love the size of the phone. Unfortunately I can't program it because it is in Spanish. The entire thing is in Spanish even the instructions. This makes the phone completely useless to me unless I can find someone to program it to display English.I finally got it onto English!!! I love the phone. It's easy to personalize (once you get to English) and its very lightweight. It is a VERY BASIC phone! I don't need all the bells and whistles so it's perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Great for a starter phone
Reviews.Author: Bshapard
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter.it's a perfect size for her and a great starter phone.no need to have a data plan, does not accept pictures but that's ok hence no data plan needed, saves me money, that is exactly what I was looking for.she loves it, she listens to music on it.  Yes, we got a Spanish version, which my daughter on her own figured it out using the internet to translate and switched the language to English.So, if she can change it, anyone can.

Reviews.Title: Big mistake!
Reviews.Author: Madeleine kazadi
Reviews.Content: The phone was purchased for my brother in London for Xmas, it's so hard to hear him on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Basic phone - does what it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: Gregory L. Meece
Reviews.Content: My son's old phone broke, and he really isn't into the whole smart phone thing. Just basic talk and occasional text. This worked fine with our T-Mobile account - no problems getting it on their network. If you're looking for a decently-priced basic phone, this seems like a good fit.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: lidice diaz
Reviews.Content: No one can hear you and you can't hear anyone that you call. All calls so muffled that you can't understand anything being said. Don't buy. Conversations breaks up as well so it isn't just the muffling, sometime can't talk at all

Reviews.Title: too small to see numbers
Reviews.Author: shel
Reviews.Content: Not for anyone with poor vision and seemed very flimsy and small to hold on ear. Never used so can't rate service
